SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am42.controller.gameDB

Class Change

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am42.controller.gameDB.Change
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Change extends Object implements Serializable
This class contains the changes made by the current player. In order to notify the changes, this class is sent to the client. If the connection is based on TCP, this class is serialized and sent. It has all the getters needed to get the changes.
See Also:
